Regression.BugsRaised: labels in (vega-ta) AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND type = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND labels in (vega-ta-reg) AND created > "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" ORDER BY priority DESC
Regression.Resolved: issuetype = Bug AND status in (Closed, Resolved) AND labels in (vega-ta) AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND type = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND labels in (vega-ta-reg) AND created > "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}"
Regression.Fixed: issuetype = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND created >= "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" AND labels = "vega-ta" AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND resolution = "Fixed"
Regression.GerritFix: issuetype = Bug AND labels in (vega-ta) AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND labels in ("dosta-gerrit", "Dosta-gerrit") AND type = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND labels in (vega-ta-reg) AND created > "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}"
Regression.Noise: issuetype = Bug AND labels in (vega-ta) AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND type = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND labels in (vega-ta-reg) AND created > "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" AND resolution in (Duplicate, "By Design") AND labels not in ("DOSTA-INVDUP", "DOSTA-INVDUP-OTHER", "DOSTA-INVBYDES", "DOSTA-INVBYDES-OTHER")
Regression.Resolution: issuetype = Bug AND project not in ("Lab Management Services (LMS)") AND created >= "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" AND labels = "vega-ta" AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND status in (Resolved, Closed)
Regression.Resolved_Defect: issuetype = Bug AND project not in ("Lab Management Services (LMS)") AND created >= "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" AND labels = "vega-ta" AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND status in (Resolved, Closed)
Regression.Un-Resolved_Defect: Type = Bug AND project not in ("Lab Management Services (LMS)") AND created >= "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}"  AND labels = vega-ta AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND status not in (Resolved, Closed)

Exploratory.BugsRaised: labels in (vega-ta) AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND type = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND labels in (vega-ta-exp) AND created > "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" ORDER BY priority DESC

Exploratory.Noise: issuetype = Bug AND labels in (vega-ta) AND labels in (vega-ta-stability) AND type = Bug AND project != "Lab Management Services (LMS)" AND labels in (vega-ta-exp) AND created > "{{start_date}}" AND created <= "{{end_date}}" AND resolution in (Duplicate, "By Design") AND labels not in ("DOSTA-INVDUP", "DOSTA-INVDUP-OTHER", "DOSTA-INVBYDES", "DOSTA-INVBYDES-OTHER")
